summary: A test suite that verifies the QASM3 exporter raises appropriate errors when encountering unsupported or invalid constructs, ensuring it rejects custom subroutines with parameters, non-integer loop bounds, opaque instructions, and overlapping classical registers without aliasing.
business_intent: Validate the robustness and correctness of the QASM3 export process by confirming that prohibited features trigger failure conditions, thereby preventing generation of malformed QASM code.
